data.title: ALL GOD'S CHILDREN GOT RHYTHM
data.meta_description: motion picture |   Made-for-TV programme or made-for-video/DVD release.   Medium length film (30-60 minutes).   A musical history of Harlem in the 1920's and 1930's, introduced by Billy Daniels and featuring Elaine Delmar, vocal, with music played by Jack Parnell and his Orchestra. (Personnel On Camera).   Motion Picture (Form).
